actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 3, 1976, and ending October 9, 1976, as "National Gifted Children Week."

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning October 3, 1976, and ending October 9, 1976, as "National Gifted Children Week."

titles.title: A resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 3, 1976, and ending October 9, 1976, as "National Gifted Children Week."
